attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: WE WOULD LIKE TO VOICE OUR CONCERNS ON THE MISUSE OF PUBLIC FUNDS BY MP`S, IF IT WAS IN DONE WITH THE GENERAL PUBLIC IT WOULD BE CLASSED AS FRAUD, SAME PURSE THOUGH, EVERYONE IN THE COUNTRY WOULD LIKE THERE HOUSING ITEMS PAID FOR BY OTHERS, WE WOULD LIKE TO SEE THEM AT THE LEAST RE-PAY ALL MONIES EXCEPT THE LONDON HOME BASIC COSTS, THEY LIKE US CAN RENT OUT THERE OTHER HOME, ALL TRUST IN THESE HAVE GONE DUE TO THERE ACTIONS AND YET SOME DICTATE TO THE PUBLIC ON WHAT TO DO AND NOT, DUEL STANDARDS.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
